tourGuide.controller

Class TourGuideController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tourGuide.controller.TourGuideController

  • @RestController
public class TourGuideController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for TourGuide endpoints

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAllCurrentLocations()
      Mapping for Get Returns: Json object of all users' current locations, in the format: {"userId":idString,"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy},{"userId":idString,"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy}] If no users are stored, an empty list is returned
      java.lang.String getLocation(java.lang.String userName)
      Mapping for Get Returns: User location if user exists, in format: {"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy} "User Not Found [userName]" if user is not in system
      java.lang.String getNearbyAttractions(java.lang.String userName)
      Mapping for Get Returns: Closest five tourist attractions for the user, regardless of distance.
      java.lang.String getRewards(java.lang.String userName)
      Mapping for Get Returns: Json object of user's current rewards, in the form of a List of UserReward objects
      java.lang.String getTripDeals(java.lang.String userName)
      Mapping for Get Returns: Json object containing 5 trip deals for user.
      java.lang.String index()
      Mapping for root url Takes no parameters, simply returns welcome message

    • Method Detail

      • index

        @RequestMapping(value="/")
public java.lang.String index()
        Mapping for root url Takes no parameters, simply returns welcome message
        Returns:
        welcome message String

      • getLocation

        @GetMapping(value="/getLocation")
public java.lang.String getLocation(@RequestParam
                                                                       java.lang.String userName)
        Mapping for Get Returns: User location if user exists, in format: {"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy} "User Not Found [userName]" if user is not in system
        Parameters:
        userName - name of user
        Returns:
        Json string of user's current location

      • getNearbyAttractions

        @GetMapping(value="/getNearbyAttractions")
public java.lang.String getNearbyAttractions(@RequestParam
                                                                                         java.lang.String userName)
        Mapping for Get Returns: Closest five tourist attractions for the user, regardless of distance. User will always receive atleast five attractions (unless the system contains less than 5 total attractions) Response includes: -Name of attraction -Attraction's lat/long -User's lat/long -Distance in miles between user's location and attraction -Reward points value for this attraction/user combination
        Parameters:
        userName - name of user
        Returns:
        Json string of user's closest five attractions.

      • getRewards

        @GetMapping(value="/getRewards")
public java.lang.String getRewards(@RequestParam
                                                                     java.lang.String userName)
        Mapping for Get Returns: Json object of user's current rewards, in the form of a List of UserReward objects
        Parameters:
        userName - name of user
        Returns:
        Json string of user's closest five attractions.

      • getAllCurrentLocations

        @GetMapping(value="/getAllCurrentLocations")
public java.lang.String getAllCurrentLocations()
        Mapping for Get Returns: Json object of all users' current locations, in the format: {"userId":idString,"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy},{"userId":idString,"longitude":xxx,"latitude":yyy}] If no users are stored, an empty list is returned
        Returns:
        Json string of all users' current locations.

      • getTripDeals

        @GetMapping(value="/getTripDeals")
public java.lang.String getTripDeals(@RequestParam
                                                                         java.lang.String userName)
        Mapping for Get Returns: Json object containing 5 trip deals for user. Includes the attraction name, price, and tripId. "User Not Found [userName]" if user is not in system
        Parameters:
        userName - user's userName
        Returns:
        Json string of all users' current locations.
